text: Geneviève Page (; born Geneviève Bonjean; 13 December 1927 – 14 February 2025) was a French actress. She was born in Paris. She retired in 2003. Her first movie role was in Pas de pitié pour les femmes (1951). She later appeared in Foreign Intrigue (1956), Song Without End (1960), El Cid (1961), Grand Prix (1966), Belle de Jour (1967) and Mayerling (1968). Page was also cast in Billy Wilder's The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes (1970). She appeared in Robert Altman's Beyond Therapy (1987). Page died in Paris on 14 February 2025, at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2025 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Geneviève Page
